titleInfo.title: Letter No. 44 to William Hornby, President and Governor, Council at Bombay, from John Beaumont at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter reports that forces have assembled to subdue the Tankseer [Tangesir] and news from Schyras [Shiraz] that Sadoo Cahn [Sadiq Khan] has confined Abdul Fatee Cahn [Abdol-Fath Khan, Karim Khan's eldest son] and assumed power thus restoring tranquility. The killing of Shaikh Yamar by Ghesaal Arabs is reported as is news that the Chaub [the Banu Ka'b tribal confederacy] have blocked the Bussora river. The letter states that a duplicate of item IOR/R/15/1/3, pp 36-40 is enclosed (but this is not contained in the file) Shipped by Bunderick [Bandar-e Rig] Dow to India via Muscat.
